revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=WNDR3700 |revision=v4 |fcc_date=06/21/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY312100186 |ic_id=4054A-12100186 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9344 |cpu1_cspeed=560 |fla1=128 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9344 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9582 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=DFS, |stock_os=Linux;2.6.31;OpenWrt-deriv; |tp_firmware=DD-WRT,OpenWrt,Gargoyle |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=NETGEARXX,NETGEARXX-5G |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}$,,,^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}-5G$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=20:E5:2A, 28:C6:8E |oui_eth=20:E5:2A, 28:C6:8E }} '''N600 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router''' :{{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=WNDR3700v4}}
"2976394803" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :This is the same ''Delta Networks'' board P/N as the [[Netgear WNDR4300]].
All the major components in the FCC photos are obscured with glue.. :but this is probably a AR9344 + AR9382 / AR9582 device.
The default SSID patterns used are presumed to be '''NETGEARXX''' :and '''NETGEARXX-5G''' (where '''XX''' is a pre-set number).
===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=41094 On the '''OpenWrt''' forums] :[https://dev.openwrt.org/ticket/13023 On the '''OpenWrt''' Trac] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=164508 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums] (w/ boot log and DD-WRT build) :20:E5:2A OUI in boot log *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Supported_devices On the '''DD-WRT''' supported devices table]
